title: That ISM Manufacturing Report? It's Worse Than You Thought
text:
The Institute for Supply Management's manufacturing report that came out Tuesday is one of the most bearish signs we've seen in recent monthsWhile this report certainly doesn't guarantee a recession is coming, it now seems inevitable that we will at least have a 2015-2016-style mini-slowdownLet's look at what happened during that period and what i...

description: Even if we don't fall into a recession, a tough slowdown is likely given the contraction in manufacturing -- here's a look at what we can expect to happen.
authors: Even If We Don'T Fall Into A Recession
A Tough Slowdown Is Likely -- Here'S A Look At What We Can Expect To Happen.
